body_html:
We have recently bumped the minimum bazel requirement to 0.4.5, so having to run bazel update is expected.
However, our checks for bazel version seem to be broken, I will look into that.

Just an idea, could you try running bazel clean right before ./configure to see if it helps with the error?
body_text:
We have recently bumped the minimum bazel requirement to 0.4.5, so having to run bazel update is expected.
However, our checks for bazel version seem to be broken, I will look into that.
Just an idea, could you try running bazel clean right before ./configure to see if it helps with the error?
body:
We have recently bumped the minimum bazel requirement to 0.4.5, so having to run bazel update is expected.
However, our checks for bazel version seem to be broken, I will look into that.

Just an idea, could you try running `bazel clean` right before `./configure` to see if it helps with the error?
